title: Mated
description: Fool the King or die.  Will this jailbird become a lady to save her neck?  When wicked Uncle Hertz reports her hiding place to the authorities, Marigold must find a way to avoid recapture.  The three handsome dragon-shifter brothers tell the sheriff that Marigold is a noble dragon newly-mated to Matheson.  But the Sheriff gives them two days to present themselves to the King for a blessing, or he will take Marigold away for torture, interrogation, and execution.  Can Matheson hold back his animosity for Marigold long enough to get the King’s blessing?  Can Marigold learn to be a lady to fool the King and keep her neck?  In this exciting installment of Goldilocks and the three Dragons, Marigold must fake a relationship with Matheson to save the brothers’ inheritance from Uncle Hertz, and to save herself from the gallows!  Get your copy now.
author: Delia Castel
